item.description:
The American Australian Association is holding a film festival on Tuesday:

The American Australian Association, New England presents

Australian Short Film Today

Tuesday, May 19, 2009
7:00pm

Brattle Theatre
40 Brattle Street, Harvard Square
Cambridge, MA 02138
Featuring the latest and greatest award-winning
short films from Australia

Curator Susan Talbot will introduce the films

Tickets $15
Students/Seniors $12

Click here to purchase tickets online at the Brattle Theatre website
http://www.brattlefil...

or tickets also available at Brattle Theatre box office.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australian Short Film Festival
